content.rendered:
High Reliability Backed by Ophthalmologists and Certified Orthoptists Worldwide Supports the Accurate Diagnosis

  • Delivers parallel light in dot shape
  • Bright and wide field of view realized by adopting an anti-reflection filter
  • Long operating time with two C-cell batteries

Contents

RXSP head, C-size battery handle, C-size batteries (2 pcs.), head attachment, spare bulb L-05, carrying case

Bulb

L-05 (3V,1.5W)

Dimensions

C-size battery handle: dia. 32 mm x 267 mm (H)

Weight

300 g
